item.title: 【Helpdesk】How to rip APPLE Music Videos in MP4 without lose quality
item.description:
I have a subscription and I'd like to rip some videos from Apple Music to Post here.
I was comparing and realized that Apple Music videos are of much higher quality than those on Tidal.
But I can only download it in M4V format. Would there be any way to get these files in MP4, with the same quality?
In this image it is possible to compare the difference between the files.
Someone can help me or teach me?
item.author: markitomg

item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - LUKA, 2-Albums: Porta Aberta,2003 (Versão 2006) + Sem Resposta (2006) [FLAC] – 16bit / 44.1 kHz
item.author: mcarloss88n
